---
title: "Money (Region/Global)"
author: "Z"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
getwd()
FPD <- read_delim("../Data/wfp_market_food_prices.csv")

FPD %>% 
  group_by(cm_name) %>% 
  select(adm0_name, mp_price, mp_year) %>% 
  group_by(mp_year, adm0_name) %>% 
  mutate(money = sum(mp_price))
  
```
